channel.title: docker on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in docker on Notes

item.title: Docker
item.description: Docker is a container technology. Cointainers standardize software packaging. It's a well timed fusion of kernel features (cgroups, namespaces) filesystem tricks (UnionFS) networking hacks (iptables) Think of a container not as a virtual machine but a very lightweight wrapper around an isolated group of processes. These processes are restricted to private root filesystem and process namespace. Docker revision-controls: filesystem layers image tags Architecture Terminology Docker server - the docker command run in daemon mode on a Linux host:
